pageContext.claim: “Remember the crazy senator from Hawaii? Do you like the Green New Deal? ‘I love it very much,’ she said. ‘Oh, OK, well, you're the senator from Hawaii.’ That's right. The beautiful island of Hawaii. She said, ‘Well, you know under the Green New Deal, you basically can't fly in an airplane.’ ‘Oh, that's a problem.’ So they said they'd build a bridge from the mainland of Hawaii, 2,000 miles long, but these are minor detail. Now, remember her when they explained to her that you know, planes are out.”
pageContext.analysis: The video of this interview with Fox News shows that Sen. Mazie Hirono (D-Hawaii) was joking. Trump describes her as supporting the Green New Deal even though it would ban air travel and hamper the journey to Hawaii. The resolution does not ban air travel and Hirono did not say she supported the plan even though it would hamper trips to Hawaii.
